analysis.description:
Reentrancy in CrwdTimelock.assignToBeneficiary (/unique_chucks/8/0x40da24a66f729d0bd0453681c5a6506bdc2a7a6a.sol#611-626):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(this) >= assignedBalance.add(_amount)) (/unique_chucks/8/0x40da24a66f729d0bd0453681c5a6506bdc2a7a6a.sol#622-626)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- assignedBalance (/unique_chucks/8/0x40da24a66f729d0bd0453681c5a6506bdc2a7a6a.sol)
	- balances (/unique_chucks/8/0x40da24a66f729d0bd0453681c5a6506bdc2a7a6a.sol)

	External calls:
	- token.transfer(_beneficiary,amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x40da24a66f729d0bd0453681c5a6506bdc2a7a6a.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/8/0x40da24a66f729d0bd0453681c5a6506bdc2a7a6a.sol)

CrwdToken.rescueToken (/unique_chucks/8/0x40da24a66f729d0bd0453681c5a6506bdc2a7a6a.sol#567-575) does not use the value returned by external calls:

CrwdTimelock.release (/unique_chucks/8/0x40da24a66f729d0bd0453681c5a6506bdc2a7a6a.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x40da24a66f729d0bd0453681c5a6506bdc2a7a6a.sol)
